categories: Category:Enlisted stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Drelosyn was a Human male who served as a corporal and scout trooper in the Stormtrooper Corps on Endor in 4 ABY.

Drelosyn honed his piloting skills by racing swoops in the underworld of the Imperial City. He participated in the Battle of Endor, during which he was pursued by Luke Skywalker. He was killed when he was shot by the Jedi and crashed into a tree. His partner Misik was killed afterwards. Like most scout troopers who used a 74-Z speeder bike, he was armed with a small blaster.
